title: France panorama. [No. 70/14]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. International cross-country championships - the English, led by Mike Taggs, are brilliant winners, with the French team taking second place ahead of Belgium. 2. Andre Marchand and Mexico - Andre Marchand, an artist from Provence, exhibits in Paris the canvases he painted in Mexico. 3. Fashions down through the generations - at the Nissim de Camondo Museum in Paris, collections patiently assembled by the French Costume Arts Union are on display. 4. Leonard Bernstein - American musician, composer, instrumentalist, and orchestra conductor, Leonard Bernstein conquers the hearts of Paris music lovers. 5. French filmmaker Henri-Georges Clouzot - the French master of film suspense, author of “Le Salaire de la Peur” and “Les Diaboliques” gives us his ideas on life and the cinema. 6. Bird’s eye view of fashions - Paris Spring fashions take wing in the skies of France’s capital.
